# RunIT Offline Dependencies
# All dependencies are bundled with the installation

Python Standard Library:
- subprocess (built-in)
- pathlib (built-in)
- os (built-in)
- sys (built-in)
- re (built-in)
- shutil (built-in)
- datetime (built-in)
- json (built-in)

No external dependencies required for core functionality.
All features work offline with Python 3.9+
